member.name: M:HandJam.Form1.TableLayoutPanelRemoveRow(System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel@,System.Windows.Forms.Control@)
member.summary: Removes the specified row from the table by saving the following rows, removing the current and following rows, then reinserting the following rows.

member.name: M:HandJam.Form1.TableLayoutPanelRemoveRow(System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel@,System.Int32@)

member.name: M:HandJam.Form1.TableLayoutPanelMoveRow(System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves the provided row down in the table by saving the following rows, then removing the provided and following rows. While reinserting the rows, the provided row is inserted right before the final row is inserted.
member.param: The row's index (the one being moved down).

member.name: M:HandJam.Form1.TableLayoutPanelChangeRow(System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel@,System.Int32,System.Object[])
member.summary: Changes the selected row by removing it and all following rows, inserting the replacement row, and then reinserting all following rows.
